oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Mayor Beverly Briley and others removing city limit sign, ca. 1962
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of former Mayor Beverly Briley and others removing Nashville city limit sign, circa 1962. Many city limit signs were initially removed due to the City of Nashville's annexation of large portions of Davidson County. The remaining signs were removed following the consolidation of the city and county governments. b & w; 35 mm.
